title: 被捕人士及服刑人士有權要求在被拘留期間投票

replies.msg:
The right to vote is protected under Article 26 of the Basic Law.
長毛用基本法第26條叉𨶙住舊制度。
Previously, there was a general automatic and indiscriminate restrictions on prisoners' right to vote. A case was brought by two men, Chan Kin-sum and Choi Chuen-sun, who were in jail during the challenge, and Leung Kwok-hung, to challenge the restrictions.

Mr. Justice Andrew Cheung ruled that inmates have the constitutional right to register as voters and cast their ballots while serving sentences, which was unjustificably infringed by the indiscriminate ban

希望梁天奇記得申請登記做選民同投票。

唔該直到投票日3日前唔好俾popo濫捕，之後上訴被無理剝削投票權要打好長官司同好多錢，到時候共產黨過咗海就係神仙，搏唔過。
